item.title: About
item.description: Michael was born 1991 in Helsinki. In 2012 he moved to Turku to study computer engineering at Ã…bo Akademi. During summers he worked at different places as an IT-support or helpdesk position. In 2016 he started working at Walkbase as an Implementation Engineer. At Walkbase he worked with network hardware and did configuration, testing and calibrating. He also did lots of customer and partner support, documentation, and even data analysis.
